title: Penetrant-induced plasticization in microporous polymer membranes
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2435-2529
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00235G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Katherine Mizrahi Rodriguez, Sharon Lin, Albert X. Wu, Kayla R. Storme, Taigyu Joo, Aristotle F. Grosz, Naksha Roy, Duha Syar, Francesco M. Benedetti, Zachary P. Smith
This review provides a comprehensive overview on the effects of plasticization on microporous polymer membranes, as well as strategies to mitigate this phenomenon for gas separation applications.
